heading: HB02568
0: AN ACT ADOPTING THE HIGHER PRESCRIBED PENALTY, INCLUDING DEATH, OF THE NATIONAL LAW OF AN ALIEN FOUND GUILTY OF TRAFFICKING DANGEROUS DRUGS AND OTHER SIMILAR SUBSTANCES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9165, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "COMPREHENSIVE DANGEROUS DRUGS ACT OF 2002"
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2019-05-20, transmitted to the Senate on 2019-05-21 and received by the Senate on 2019-05-21 Substituted by HB08909
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02568
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ADOPTING THE HIGHER PRESCRIBED PENALTY, INCLUDING DEATH, OF THE NATIONAL LAW OF AN ALIEN FOUND GUILTY OF TRAFFICKING DANGEROUS DRUGS AND OTHER SIMILAR SUBSTANCES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9165, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "COMPREHENSIVE DANGEROUS DRUGS ACT OF 2002"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : RODRIGUEZ, MAXIMO JR.B.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-08
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-25
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Philippine National Police Anti-Illegal Drugs Group
      2. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-30
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency and the National Bureau of Investigation
      3. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-06
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Department of Justice
MOTHER BILL: HB08909
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DANGEROUS DRUGS ON 2016-08-15
